wiki_section_title: Men 's year rankings

wiki_section_text: Key : Current world record

intro: The following table shows the yearly rankings in the marathon since 1921 (men) and 1980 (women), based on the best performance in the classic distance race of 42.195 km (26 miles 385 yards). Unless otherwise noted, all data is compiled from the Association of Road Racing Statisticians.
